/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs lining both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Power lines stretch across the scene, connecting the buildings that can be seen in the distance. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, add a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's gaze down the length of the street. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
